lines.text: Recently moved to the city from a northern province. Young, idealistic, they believe in the power of democracy and “civic engagement”. Frequently attend local council meetings and keep up with the news.

The wife has an art education and teaches a children's art class, while the husband works as a math teacher. They expect transparency and a “bright future” from the authorities. Vulnerable to influence through fear, especially if shown the instability of a world without a strong hand.
